revised_title: Keith Dalziel: A Pioneering Biochemist and Enzymologist
tldr: This biographical memoir recounts the life and career of Keith Dalziel, a self-taught biochemist and enzymologist who overcame challenging circumstances to make significant contributions to the fields of haemoglobin and alcohol dehydrogenase kinetics. Dalziel's perseverance and dedication to research led to a successful career, including a fellowship in the Royal Society, and his work continues to inspire future generations of scientists.
